Articles.Content:
Are there any mods that will calculate e.g. how many hours it would take for your fuel cells to run out of fuel? I have Fusebox for calculating how long my batteries will last, which is great, but I could really do with some for resources more generally.

Did a bit of googling but couldn't find anything obvious.

Not that I know of, but it's not a particularly hard calculation either, just one division.

Total up your LiquidFuel, divide by 0.0016875 (for the small one) or 0.02025 (for the big one). The answer is the time it will run in seconds. The numbers are directly off the right-click info panel in the VAB.

KCT, EPL, or just a dedicated Resource Overview will total up your resource amounts for you. I'm sure there's other mods that will do the same.

It would probably be a good addition to Fusebox.

- - - Updated - - -

Oh and here's one for the tracking station: Resource Details in Tracking Center (which I use a lot to see which ships are empty or which ships need what resources)
